results.title: Stop Pretending You Know What AI Does to the Economy
results.summary: Noah Smith critiques the widespread "AI pessimism," where people assume AI will inherently harm the economy by causing job loss and increased inequality. He notes that even some in the AI industry and center-left thinkers share this view. Economist Daron Acemoglu argues AI development should not be left solely to entrepreneurs. Smith points out that despite these fears, AI has not yet had a detectably negative effect on the job market. "AI has not yet had a detectably negative effect on the job market, which remains just about as strong as it has ever been in the country’s history." While acknowledging potential future impacts, Smith emphasizes the importance of understanding why previous AI pessimism has been a false alarm. This view contrasts with biblical warnings about the dangers of human pride and reliance on technology over God (Proverbs 16:18, Isaiah 2:22).

results.title: Hedge Funds Boost Industrial Stocks to Five-Year High
results.summary: An AI-generated news article reports a surge in hedge fund investments in industrial stocks, driven by economic recovery and infrastructure projects. The article advises focusing on 'Alpha' for stock selection. The disclaimer notes the AI-generated nature and encourages independent verification. This approach contradicts biblical principles of discernment and truthfulness. (John 8:44, Proverbs 12:22)

results.title: US Futures Steady Ahead of Big Tech Earnings
results.summary: US stock futures remain stable as traders anticipate big-tech earnings reports, including Alphabet and Tesla. FactSet reports that over 86% of S&P 500 firms have exceeded expectations this earnings season. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick emphasizes an August 1 deadline for tariff payments. While the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite reached all-time highs last week, the Dow experienced a slight decrease. Believers should be mindful of relying solely on economic indicators and remember, 'Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal' (Matthew 6:19, KJV).

results.title: Automating Construction with Self-Driving Diggers: Bedrock Robotics Launches with $80 Million
results.summary: A team from Waymo has launched Bedrock Robotics, securing $80 million to automate excavators using AI. "Bedrock Robotics’ automation platform is poised to be the workhorse of the new American economy." The system uses cameras and lidar to enhance existing machinery, addressing labor shortages. This technology presents both opportunities and challenges in a rapidly evolving industry. We must remember scripture in all things and not be lead astray by technology and trust in God alone. (Psalm 20:7)
